title: A study on thermal behaviour of thermal barrier coating: investigation of particle size, YSZ/polysilazane, time and temperature curing effect
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24687-24702
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03620D, Paper

Widyastuti, Liyana Labiba Zulfa, Wafiq Azhar Rizaldi, Jauhari Azhar, Ninik Safrida, Azzah Dyah Pratama, Ruri Agung Wahyuono, Sulistijono, Rindang Fajarin, Arif Nur Hakim
Thermal conductivity and adhesion strength effects were studied for thermal barrier coatings (TBCs) with different particle sizes, YSZ content, time, and temperature curing.
